alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:18PM CDT until June 20 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR WESTERN HARRISON...HANCOCK AND SOUTH CENTRAL PEARL RIVER COUNTIES... At 117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bay St. Louis, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln, Shoreline Park and Lyman. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 32. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 8 and 11. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
